website_summaries.verdict: The supermodel of ceiling fans, this is a stunning fan with a super high price.
pros: It will look amazing in any room thanks to chrome and frosted exterior
Five blades create sharp gusts of air when the fan is on
The 4 lights make the fan look modern and useful
cons: Expensive if you are on a budget

customer_reviews.title: So beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: I got this to replace a much older ceiling fan that was noisy & unbalanced. While installation wasn't trivial (I had to deal with an electrical short in house wiring & correcting the mounting of the ceiling electrical box) once it was all in, it looked great & performed perfectly. I changed the fluorescent bulbs for small diameter LED bulbs that fit the glass shades because I hate CFLs now, and that is the only reason I gave this 4 stars instead of 5.
customer_reviews.author: curiousGoJ

customer_reviews.title: It's good.
customer_reviews.text: This one actually produces enough light where I'm comfortable in a ~450 sqft bedroom, which can't be said for just about anything else I've found which wasn't generous with room for 300w-equivalent CFL bulbs (and much more expensive, which was a consideration for me because I'm in a rental). I just wish there was the tiniest bit more room for slightly larger bulbs, but after using it for about 8 months it gives off plenty of light (unlike anything smaller.)
customer_reviews.author: Andrew T

customer_reviews.title: Terrible to install!
customer_reviews.text: Looks great, works well so far. Worst fan install of my life! I just installed cheap home depot fans in each kids bedroom last week, they took maybe 2 hours each. This one took 6! The housing do not fit together well, and the is barely enough room for wiring, so each piece it a fight. Wasted a good hour trying to install it as flush mount with the remote pack before I realized there isn't enough clearance by about 2mm. Had to use the down-rod which I had NOT planned on. The designers must never have installed on or they would make the few changes needed to make this a great fan.
customer_reviews.author: Liz J

customer_reviews.title: Love this fan!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely LOVE this fan!!! It was 100 times better than the pictures, it's absolutely beautiful and the lights are soo bright!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah W

customer_reviews.title: Love this fan!
customer_reviews.text: I love this fan so much I bought 2 more for other rooms! The light it gives off is bright and a nice true white daylight...and comes with the bulbs. I love the modern/contemporary look and the lights don't point downward but out to the side. The fan gives sufficient air movement even for larger rooms on medium speed. I wish the price didn't jump so much! Got the first 2 for 166 and 168, then I jumped when it went down to 139. So watch the price!
customer_reviews.author: MommySteph

customer_reviews.title: I keep adding more of these to my home!
customer_reviews.text: They are pretty easy to install, super bright without creating shadows and look modern and elegant. Quick tip on the bulbs: If you care about the exact color of the bulbs matching, you may need to purchase all new bulbs if just 1 goes out. I bought a replacement and found that the color is more yellow than the other three. I hear that this is common with bulbs but the effect was amplified with these types of bulbs.
customer_reviews.author: Beckova

customer_reviews.title: Much better than expected and would definitely purchase again
customer_reviews.text: I'm impressed on how well this item works,fits and looks. Much better than expected and would definitely purchase again. This is the fan to get if you want something that looks impressive/modern without the 100 year old styling ceiling fans usually have. Super quiet. Did not need to balance and installed as easy as any other fan I have hung. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: superthaix

customer_reviews.title: Trouble free transaction, good product.
customer_reviews.text: Looks good. Once the bulbs warm up, gives off lots of bright white light. Would have liked to have paid less.
customer_reviews.author: FortunateOne

customer_reviews.title: This ceiling fan in absolutely beautiful. I chose the black side for the den ...
customer_reviews.text: This ceiling fan in absolutely beautiful. I chose the black side for the den and it is just wonderful. It runs quiet and the light it has is super. I love the bright white light is puts off. I am now looking forward to purchasing 2 more for the living room and the master bedroom. Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Judy Henry

customer_reviews.title: We love the fan
customer_reviews.text: We love the fan. It was packaged well. Nothing missing. I wish there were more varieties of fans made this pretty for this price.
customer_reviews.author: PATRICIA

customer_reviews.title: Awesome fan! A must haven
customer_reviews.text: Great fan! Bright. The natural light is something to get used to, but we like it now. Fan moves air that's for sure. Looks super neat. Many compliments.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse Schwab

customer_reviews.title: Nice light, nicer price
customer_reviews.text: Nice light,nicer price.You can tell the quality just by picking up the housing.The motor is HEAVY,obviously a well constructed piece,lots of windings,reminds me of old school electric motors.Something that will last.
customer_reviews.author: Stephie Lulu

customer_reviews.title: nice modern white fan
customer_reviews.text: Modern fan and not too difficult to install; however the light bulbs are incandescent and give off an odd glow for my taste so I changed the bulbs.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Great looking fan
customer_reviews.text: The fan looks great and functions perfectly. I use it on a daily basis and love it. Would recommend it to anyone who is shopping for a ceiling fan.
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: looks great
customer_reviews.text: Looks great and works great. hung it in the living room, matched it with remote, no more string and pulls
customer_reviews.author: ermolko

customer_reviews.title: Love this! I have it for more than 3 ...
customer_reviews.text: Love this! I have it for more than 3 years and it still looks amazing and I get complements about it.
customer_reviews.author: Johanne Mckenzie

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Fan
customer_reviews.text: Love the fan. It looks really beautiful in my bedroom and is very quiet. Over all it exceeded my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: We have had this light for a hile now if runs very quietly and looks outstanding!
customer_reviews.author: Patrick A Pizzulo

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful looking fan. A little labor intensive but when finished well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: W. Stanley Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great modern look
customer_reviews.text: Great modern look, nice bright lighting and it runs great as well. I plan to purchase more to replace other fans within my home. Very happy with purchase!!
customer_reviews.author: Mike H.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice fan, It was what I was looking for! I recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Yoan Pumar

customer_reviews.title: Love this fan.
customer_reviews.text: This is a really attractive and modern looking fan - works well and gives great light. You won't be disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Cousins

customer_reviews.title: Perfect ceiling fan
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful, provides fantastic light and is exactly what I was looking for
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful item!!! Modern & sleek - fantastic quality. Super quiet as well!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Hardaway

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful fan, prettty than pictured.
customer_reviews.text: Not disappointed, we hung it right away even though the room was not done yet due to the excitement of it!
customer_reviews.author: daniel mcneil

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: looked good was missing parts westinghouse would not send needed items, returned.
customer_reviews.author: plp

customer_reviews.title: It looks expensive!
customer_reviews.text: I received this as an early Christmas present and it's breathtaking; there's no word to describe how beautiful it is. The lacquer finish blades makes it look like glass when the lights are on. If you're looking for a modern / contemporary and unique style, then this is the perfect fan. In addition, the amount of light it gives out is just right for my kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Mrt

product_meta.title: Westinghouse Lighting 7255900 Panorama 52-Inch Reversible Five-Blade Indoor Ceiling Fan, Chrome
product_meta.description:
The Westinghouse Panorama Four-Light 52-Inch Five-Blade Ceiling Fan has a clean, cutting-edge look that suits contemporary decors. With its chrome finish, chrome with frosted glass light fixture, and five reversible high-gloss black and white blades, this fan offers sleek, modern style.

Ideal for rooms up to 144 square feet (12 by 12 feet), this fan features a powerful 153-by-17-millimeter silicon steel motor with triple capacitor and is remote control adaptable. Three fan speeds (high/medium/low) and a reversible switch help keep you comfortable. In warm weather, you can run the fan counterclockwise to stay cooler. In cool weather, run it clockwise to recirculate warm air from the ceiling, eliminating cold spots and drafts. 

The fan provides airflow of up to 4,733 cubic feet per minute (cfm). It is rated to operate at 63 watts at high speed (without the lights), which gives it an airflow efficiency rating of 75 cfm per watt. (As a comparison, 49- to 60-inch ceiling fans have airflow efficiencies ranging from approximately 51 to 176 cfm per watt at high speed.) 

This Westinghouse ceiling fan is backed by a lifetime motor warranty and a two-year warranty on all other parts. Product reference number 72559.
feature_bullets: Unique four-light 52-inch five-blade indoor ceiling fan for rooms up to 144 square feet (12 by 12 feet)
153-by-17-millimeter silicon steel motor with triple capacitor; three fan speeds (high/medium/low); reversible switch for year-round use
Airflow: 4,733 cfm; Energy Usage: 63 watts without light; Airflow Efficiency: 75 cfm per watt
Includes 3/4-inch diameter down rod, 54-inch lead wire, pull chains and 4-medium base 14 watt Mini Twist CFL light bulbs
Lifetime motor warranty; two-year warranty on all other parts

specifications.Included Components: Panorama 52-Inch Reversible Five-Blade Indoor Ceiling Fan 54-Inch Lead Wire 4-Inch Length By 3/4-Inch Diameter Down Rod Pull Chains 4 x Medium Base 14 Watt Mini Twist Cfl Light Bulbs
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars54 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
